703350f-a.title: Brooklyn: Brooklyn Avenue - Herkimer Street
703350f-a.text:
Prooklyn Ave., north from and including Herkimer, to and including Fulton Streets. The view shows The Fulton Street Brooklyn Manhattan Transit Elevated Lines. In the background, is seen the Tompkins Ave..
Congregational Church.
June 2, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
RODUCTIONS.  NO REP.
703350f-a.folder: Brooklyn Avenue & Herkimer Street, Brooklyn, NY

704867f-b.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Brooklyn Avenue
704867f-b.text:
Herkimer Street, east trom Brooklgn Avenue. Views land f show the buildings on the north side of the street, the houses in
view 2 being east of St. Andrews Place.
View 3 shows the south. side of the street.
P. L. Sperr  Augsa t 27, 1941
NO REPPODUCTIONS  Views 1,2,3
